name: Home Page of Cameron Cairns
body:
### About Me
I'm a Computer Science and Engineering major in my senior year at the University of California Davis. I am expecting to graduate in March, 2015. I am interested in developing for the mobile and internet marketplace, preferably something involved in music or planning events such as concerts. I am also an avid player of Paradox Interactive games such as Crusader Kings 2, and Europa Universalis. I also run a [student radio station](www.kdvs.org) in my free time. 

### Current Projects
I am currently working on a vehicle to vehicle networking application using the Android OS to stream video from cars using WIFI P2P. I'm also designing a radio streaming app for KDVS when I'm not busy with school or radio station work.

### Languages
C		2 Years 
C++ 		2 Years
Java 		6 Weeks (Computer Languages Course and Self Study)
SQL		10 Weeks (Databases Course)
OpenGl 	10 Weeks (Computer Graphics Course)
Others: Python, Android SDK, Matlab, LISP, Prolog

### Skills:
- Experience in managing the direction of an organization, identifying the needs of an organization, strategic planning for both the immediate and distant future, and following through with those plans to ensure their execution.

### Job Experience:

General Manager of KDVS 90.3 FM (May 2013 – April 2014)
- Learning to manage 22 paid staff and over 100 active volunteers
- Learned the importance of managing deadlines with a $120,000 radio transmitter project
- Professional interactions with people 10 – 40 years my senior, some of them being employees

Resident Computing Advisor (April 2012 – December 2013)
- Improved customer service skills
- Gained insight on usage patterns of novice computer users
- Learned to work as a team with coworkers meeting for only one hour each week

KDVS 90.3 FM Business Manager ( June 2012 – May 2013)
- Experienced the departmentalization of services within a large organization
- Learned how to read and stay within a $100,000 budget
- Experience purchasing processes within large organizations

### More info
Thank you for taking the time to visit my website. For More information please feel free to contact me at cameron@cameroncairns.com
